about_the_game:
The Digital Deluxe Edition Upgrade includes three monster allies and some consumable items for your journey:
　・x25 Bestest Buddy Bullet
　・x25 Omniheal Bomb
　・x1 Great Sabercat
　・x1 Ruby Golem
　・x1 Icy Dragling

*This product does not include the main game "DRAGON QUEST TREASURES".
*This product includes the same content as the "DRAGON QUEST TREASURES Digital Deluxe Edition". If you have already purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition, you will not be able to purchase this product.
